page.title: 03SPORTS DAY 1985
page.content: Sports day is a good day and everyone is in a race.At our school these are the names of our teams and their colours.Aylward is green, Barnardo is yellow, Shaftesbury is blue and Keller is red.The flat race is a running race when you run 50m from the bottom end to the top of the field. The sack race when you get in a sack and bounce up and down to the finish. The egg and spoon race is when you carry an egg on a spoon up to the finish line.The potato race is where you have 5 bean bags in a line.You have to pick up each one in turn and put it in a bucket.After you have put them all in the bucket you run to the finish line.Points are given to the winners and to the second, third and fourth places.The team which has got the most points wins the shield . CRAIG,STUART, aged 10
